title: aoluain

created_time: August 27, 2022, 12:39:48 PMLast edit: September 04, 2022, 08:45:48 PM by aoluain
content: I HAVE 6 PRINTS, THESE WERE THE FIRST PRINTS OF THE BITCOIN COLOURING BOOK OFF THE PRESS WHICH WERE ERROR'SI am also going to include #48 of my Bitcoin Colouring Book for this RaffleThe machine was set to print back to back! The operator reset the machine and started again.So there are only 6 "ERROR PRINTS" and 1/6 is being raffled here, All proceeds will be heading to hodlonaut:https://www.defendingbtc.comIf anyone is wondering what the hell is all that about, go here > https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410629.0The item is stamped, dated and signedPOSTAGE INCLUDEDEach ticket is $3 worth of BTC and up to 3 tickets per person, everyone is welcome.Winner will be picked from the last two digits of the hash of a future blockCompliments of @ZipReg I will be using the preecs trackerPayment address to follow when all tickets are sold  +
